Posts.Content: Nov 1, 2011 04:52AM Stacie-in-MN wrote: I am 50 years old, and just finished chemo with the A/C (red devil)  It did not make me very sick, I was a little tired 3-4 days after, but I never missed a day of work and my tumor shrunk to where I can not feel it.  Take the A/C.
Posts.Title: Red devil or not? Teakay sarasowise
